attributes.action: Theresa May must resign now.  To save brexit we need a leave supporting leader.
attributes.background:
Brexit is at risk of not happening and the UK will remain in the EU in all but name  but with less say than ever before. 
Theresa May said no deal was better than a bad deal and now she is selling the country down the river to get any deal instead of no deal.   
Theresa May must go now.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP or Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
